question: Who of the following will represent India at the 2017 Universal Periodic Review (UPR) of the UN Human Rights Council (UNHRC)?
explanation: Shri Mukul Rohatgi, the Attorney General of India is leading the Indian delegation at the 2017 Universal Periodic Review (UPR) of the UN Human Rights Council. The National Report of India covers areas that were part of the recommendations accepted by us following the UPR-II in 2012. The Report also covers areas that we wish to share with member countries as part of the peer review mechanism and in a spirit of cooperative engagement.
